title: MB1 Attack Move Binding Pls
body:
As an adc main, I've been trying to bind attack move to my left mouse button, but obviously i can't in game, and manually changing settings in input.ini changes nothing. here's how my input looks. 


[GameEvents]  
evtPlayerAttackMove=[]  
evtPlayerAttackMoveClick=[Button 1]  
evtPlayerSelectClick = [Button 3]   
evtOnUIMouse4Pan=[]  


[MouseSettings]  
RollerButtonSpeed = 0  


[HUDEvents]   
evtOnUIMouse1 = [Button 1], [Button 3]   
evtOnUIMouse2 = [Button 2]   
evntHudMoveableSelect = [Button 3]  


I delete the persistentsettings.JSON file every time but nothing changes. I go into a custom game and attack move is still unbound. This is ridiculous. Any help would bbe appreciated :)

replies.body: You don't delete the **PersistedSettings.json** file, you have to make the same change in there as you do in **input.ini**.

Switching mouse bindings is not something that's currently officially supported, and doing so might cause some issues with your gameplay.  If you are still experiencing issues with your mouse, please reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to look into your configuration for you.
